# appetizers

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Overview

The goal of `{appetizers}` is to house small Shiny apps developed for project/task management, data collection, data management, and more. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of appetizers from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("LouisMPenrod/appetizers")
```

## Getting help

If you encounter a bug, please file an issue with a minimal reproducible example on [GitHub](https://github.com/LouisMPenrod/appetizers/issues).

[GitHub Issues](https://github.com/LouisMPenrod/appetizers/issues) can also be used to request the authors to add features or entire apps.
